<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.GetLoggedInUserName</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetLoggedInUserName</name><script><![CDATA[var GetLoggedInUserName = Class.create();
GetLoggedInUserName.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    
    getUserName: function() {
        var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        if (user.get(gs.getUserID())) {
            return user.user_name;
        }
        return '';
    },

    type: 'GetLoggedInUserName'
};






]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-17 06:47:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe04029e8336c2108dc4c829feaad3f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetLoggedInUserName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fe04029e8336c2108dc4c829feaad3f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 09:32:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
